value.Name: Joomla
value.Value: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-16"?><FsPickler version="2.0.0.0" type="Microsoft.FSharp.Collections.FSharpList`1[System.String]"><value flags="sequence"><elem>Core - Remote Code Execution Vulnerability</elem><elem>Directory traversal vulnerability in Joomla! 3.4.x before 3.4.6</elem><elem>SQL injection vulnerability in Joomla! 3.x before 3.4.7</elem><elem>Joomla Account Creation and Privilege Escalation</elem><elem>Account Creation / Privilege Escalation</elem><elem>Core - Account Modifications</elem><elem>JFilterInput::isFileSafe() arbitrary file upload</elem><elem>SQL injection vulnerability</elem><elem>LDAP Injection</elem></value></FsPickler>
